task.title: Copying Additional Resources to Output Directory using a Transformation Parameter
task.shortdesc: You can accomplish this task using the webhelp.custom.resources parameter.

context.p: To copy additional resources to the output directory using a transformation scenario from within Oxygen XML Editor/Author, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Place all your resources in the same directory.
Edit the WebHelp transformation scenario, then open the Parameters tab.
Edit the value for the webhelp.custom.resources parameter and set it to the absolute path of the directory in step 1.
Click OK to save the changes to the transformation scenario.

taskbody.result: All files from the new directory will be copied to the root of the WebHelp output directory.
